name: Fire Giant War Priest
description: An imposing and massive giant with fiery magical abilities, often wielding a greatsword.
memorable: Combines martial prowess with fiery magic, capable of devastating area attacks.
goals: To dominate the battlefield using fire magic and brute strength.
relations: May be encountered alongside other fire giants or elemental creatures.
environment: Typically found in volcanic or mountainous regions.
strengths: Immune to fire damage and can empower allies' attacks with additional fire damage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to cold damage, which reduces its speed.
attacks: Capable of making powerful melee attacks with a greatsword and throwing rocks, dealing slashing and bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Pillar of Flame creates a large area of fire that can cause massive damage.
skills: Notable in athletics, perception, and intimidation.
additional_information: Can use Sword Sweep to attack multiple foes around it.
Ignite Blades ability enhances allies' attacks with fire damage for a duration.
Kick reaction adds defensive capabilities against smaller attackers.
Cold Weakness reduces its speed when taking cold damage.
High damage output makes it a formidable opponent.
